CustomField.description: Button name on the preview screen, use the label representing next action, for example if your bulk action has input flow to capture task fields, name should be 'Enter Task Details' or bulk action do not have input flow and only have action flow, label can be 'Create Tasks for selected cases'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Button name on the preview screen, use the label representing next action, for example if your bulk action has input flow to capture task fields, name should be 'Enter Task Details' or bulk action do not have input flow and only have action flow, label can be 'Create Tasks for selected cases'
CustomField.label: Preview Screen Button Name
